page.title: 20MERCASTON LANE QUARRY
page.content: { Mercaston Quarry}produces{sand}and a small amount of{gravel,}which it sends to the{English China Clay Group {(Charcon Products).}It contains only a small amount of machinery as the quarry has just started being re- worked.There are,however,{three {conveyor belts,two bulldozers,a dumper {truck,a digger}and{several lorries}to transport the goods to the buyers. The quarry,that covers an area of about {two acres}and is about{twenty five {metres}deep,is also used as a dump for all the{shale like rocks}from the tunnel being built at{Carsington.
